text:
*[Bug 18919] [<-.POSIXlt and [[<-.POSIXlt do not reconcile time zones of 'x', 'value' before subassignment*
https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18919

Mikael Jagan (jaganmn@mcmaster.ca) changed:

           What    |Removed                     |Added
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Attachment #3509|0                           |1
        is obsolete|                            |

--- Comment #1 from Mikael Jagan (jaganmn@mcmaster.ca) ---
Created attachment 3510
  --> <https://bugs.r-project.org/attachment.cgi?id=3510&action=edit>
reconciling time zones in subassignment to POSIXlt (with typo fix)

Sorry, attachment 3509 changed `class(x) <- NULL` to `class(x) <-
unCfillPOSIXlt(x)`, where `x <- unCfillPOSIXlt(x)` was intended.  Fixed in this
new patch ...
